ah and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is

January 9th 2018 and the thought of the

curtain the economy is breaking apart
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now when we look at the
economy we know and we've been looking
at all these different indicators the
economy is one gigantic illusion they
have the curtain and everything
happening behind the curtain is what is
really happening everything in front of
the curtain well that's the illusion
part where they want you to think that
everything is great and we're seeing
many different indicators showing us
that we are already in this recession or
the recession is on its way now if we go
back to 2016 we can see what the retail

unemployment we know a lot of these are
manipulated we can see that these
numbers really don't tell the entire
story the stock market definitely does
not tell any story whatsoever and when
we look at these indicators and we're
talking about the real people's economy
we see that there are major major
problems now the jolts report came out
and they're saying that the job openings
dropped to the lowest in six months now
what is happening here is there's a lot
of individuals that are getting laid off
we know that retail has been shutting
down a lot of stores have been closing
the bingham bankrupt bankrupt
we know corporations have been going
bankrupt and laying off individuals we
also know that corporations well they
have these job wrecks and they want to
keep them open but there's a hiring
freeze if they don't interview people
and they don't continually bring in
people just to interview they're never
gonna hire them they lose their job
wrecks and this usually comes down from
higher up in the company telling you yes
I know you have the job wrecks yes you
need to bring someone in but don't hire
them there's a hiring freeze and if you
don't bring people in you lose your job
wreck now we're seeing a pattern that we
saw up back
in 2007 going into 2008 where the job
openings and hires they start to decline
at the same time and we are now seeing
this and we have been seeing it since
2016 it is now on the downward
trajectory which tells us that we are
heading towards another recession that
we're seeing the same patterns all over
the place we're also seeing these new
chapter 11 bankruptcy in the United
States where in the month of December
they have doubled from a year ago to six
hundred and ninety nine filings that's a
jump of three hundred and sixty two
filings from last year this is the
largest year-over-year jump since the
financial crisis and if we're in this
incredible economy and everything is
recovering why would we have all of
these bankruptcies it doesn't make sense
a spike like this in Chapter eleven
filings in a month of December is
unheard of in normal times normally

the first four or five months of the
year but not at the end of the year but
again we're not in normal times we're
living in an illusion in December the
chapter 11 filing soared by 61% from
November and when we look at this we
could see that yes this has happened now
we've seen this before not in the month
of December but we've seen it before
where there was a lot of companies
filing for chapter 11 this was the oil
bust then we had the brick and mortar
meltdown and now all of a sudden in
December we've had a huge surge in a

that there's something going on there's
something wrong with the economy it's
breaking down very quickly if we look at

2016 we go back to 2015 2014 actually we
don't see this in December
this is very interesting now Bill Gross
the bond guru he made a statement last

now he said this last year and he is

behind the scenes it always happens

before it gets to the public because the
